member.name: P:StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatMessage.Id
member.summary: The internal identifier for this chat message

member.name: P:StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatMessage.IsSystemMessage
member.summary: True if this message was generated by the underlying chat service, and not by another user.

member.name: P:StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatMessage.IsActionMessage
member.summary: True if the message is a /me message, or whatever the equivalent is on the current chat service.

member.name: P:StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatMessage.IsHighlighted
member.summary: True if the message should be highlighted (pings, subscriber notifications, etc)

member.name: P:StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatMessage.IsPing
member.summary: True if the logged in user was tagged/pinged in this message.

member.name: P:StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatMessage.Message
member.summary: The exact message the user sent into the chat, *with* any custom formatting applied by the chat service.

member.name: P:StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatMessage.Sender
member.summary: The user who sent this message

member.name: P:StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatMessage.Channel
member.summary: The channel this message was sent in

member.name: P:StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatMessage.Emotes
member.summary: A list of *all* the emotes/emojis contained in this message, in reverse order to make replacing them with something else extremely simple.

member.name: P:StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatMessage.Metadata
member.summary: All the raw metadata associated with this message. This contains platform-specific data for devs who want to access any extra data that may not have been parsed.

member.name: P:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.DisplayName
member.summary: The display name of the service

member.name: E:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.OnLogin
member.summary: Callback that occurs when a successful login to the provided streaming service occurs

member.name: E:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.OnTextMessageReceived
member.summary: Callback that occurs when a text message is received

member.name: E:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.OnJoinChannel
member.summary: Callback that occurs when the user joins a chat channel

member.name: E:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.OnRoomStateUpdated
member.summary: Callback that occurs when a chat channel receives updated info

member.name: E:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.OnLeaveChannel
member.summary: Callback that occurs when the user leaves a chat channel

member.name: E:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.OnChatCleared
member.summary: Callback that occurs when a users chat is cleared. If null, that means the entire chat was cleared; otherwise the argument is a user id.

member.name: E:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.OnMessageCleared
member.summary: Callback that occurs when a specific chat message is cleared. Argument is the message id to be cleared.

member.name: M:StreamCore.Interfaces.IStreamingService.SendTextMessage(System.String,StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatChannel)
member.summary: Sends a text message to the specified IChatChannel
member.param: The text message to be sent
The chat channel to send the message to

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchEmote.Bits
member.summary: The number of bits associated with this emote (probably a cheermote)

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchEmote.Color
member.summary: If there are bits associated with this emote, this is the color the bits text should be.

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchMessage.Type
member.summary: The IRC message type for this TwitchMessage

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchMessage.Bits
member.summary: The number of bits in this message, if any.

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchRoomstate.SlowModeInterval
member.summary: The number of seconds a chatter without moderator privileges must wait between sending messages

member.name: P:StreamCore.Models.Twitch.TwitchRoomstate.MinFollowTime
member.summary: If FollowersOnly is true, this specifies the number of minutes a user must be following before they can chat.

member.name: T:StreamCore.Services.StreamingService
member.summary: A multiplexer for all the supported streaming services.

member.name: M:StreamCore.Services.Twitch.TwitchMessageParser.ParseRawMessage(System.String,System.Collections.Concurrent.ConcurrentDictionary{System.String,StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatChannel},StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatUser,StreamCore.Interfaces.IChatMessage[]@)
member.summary: Takes a raw Twitch message and parses it into an IChatMessage
member.param: The raw message sent from Twitch
A list of chat messages that were parsed from the rawMessage

member.name: M:StreamCore.Services.Twitch.TwitchService.SendRawMessage(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends a raw message to the Twitch server
member.param:
Whether or not the message should also be sent to other clients in the assembly that implement StreamCore, or only to the Twitch server.
This should only be set to true if the Twitch server would rebroadcast this message to other external clients as a response to the message.
